inclusion.criterion: Disabling Ischemic stroke symptoms with onset < 3 hours treated with IV rt-PA by local standards.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Evidence of intracranial hemorrhage (ICH) on baseline CT scan or diagnosis of a non-vascular cause of neurologic deficit.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Uncontrolled hypertension (SBP > 185 mmHg or DBP >110 mmHg) that does not respond to intravenous anti-hypertensive agents.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 62-year-old African-American man with left upper and lower extremity weakness, associated with dark visual spot in right eye, right facial numbness, facial drop and slurred speech. He smokes cigarette 1 pack per day for 40 years and alcohol consumption of 5 to 6 beers per week.
